price: Hakika wewe ni miongoni mwa walio tumwa!
footnotes: Hakika wewe, Muhammad, ni katika wale ambao Mwenyezi Mungu amewatuma kwa watu wawapelekee Uwongofu na Dini ya Haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
